name: ENExposureConfiguration
desc: The object that contains parameters for configuring exposure notification risk scoring behavior.

items.name: var attenuationDurationThresholds: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The configurable signal-loss thresholds for calculating exposure risk.

items.name: var immediateDurationWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level indicating the duration of the user’s exposure at immediate distance.

items.name: var mediumDurationWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level indicating the duration of the user’s exposure at medium distance.

items.name: var nearDurationWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level indicating the duration of the user’s exposure at close distance.

items.name: var otherDurationWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level indicating the duration of the user’s exposure at a large distance.

items.name: var daysSinceLastExposureThreshold: Int
items.desc: The number of days to consider when calculating the risk level.

items.name: var infectiousnessForDaysSinceOnsetOfSymptoms: [NSNumber : NSNumber]?
items.desc: The mapping between the days since onset of symptoms to the degree of infectiousness.

items.name: var infectiousnessHighWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight to apply for severe infectiousness.

items.name: var infectiousnessStandardWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight to apply for mild infectiousness.

items.name: let ENDaysSinceOnsetOfSymptomsUnknown: Int
items.desc: A value used when the number of days since onset of symptoms is unknown.

items.name: var reportTypeConfirmedClinicalDiagnosisWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level based on a confirmed clinical diagnosis.

items.name: var reportTypeConfirmedTestWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level based on a confirmed test.

items.name: var reportTypeRecursiveWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level based on an exposure to someone exposed to someone else.

items.name: var reportTypeSelfReportedWeight: Double
items.desc: The weight assigned to a risk level based on a self-reported diagnoisis.

items.name: var reportTypeNoneMap: ENDiagnosisReportType
items.desc: The report type to map an unknown diagnosis to.
